Colon de 38 años, tiene una panadería, vive en el Guasmo de Guayaquil (lugar caracterizado porque la mayor parte de sus habitantes son comerciantes informales). 

Un amigo le enseño a preparar pan para que el tenga la oportunidad de mantener con una mejor economía a su familia, con el tiempo el pudo comprar hornos y harina para tener una producción de panes mas alta. En la actualidad trabaja desde las 05h30am hasta las 23h00pm todos los días. Cada pan lo vende a $ 0.08, Su esposa le ayuda con la preparación de panes y otros dulces que hacen para vender en la panadería.

Con el préstamo quiere comprar harina, manteca, azúcar para su negocio. En el futuro quiere seguir con su panadería pero agrandarla mas y poder construir su casa con otro piso para sus cuatro hijos de 13, 10, 6 y 4 años.
texts.en:
Colon is 38 years old and owns a bakery.  He lives in Guasmo de Guayaquil (a place which is noted for the fact that most of its inhabitants are informal shopkeepers).

A friend taught him how to to make bread so that he would have the opportunity to better provide for his family.  Over time, he was able to buy ovens and flour in order to produce more bread.  He currently works from 5.30am to 11.00pm every day of the week.  He sells each loaf of bread for $0.08.  His wife helps him make the bread and other pastries which they sell in the bakery.

With his loan he would like to buy flour, butter and sugar for his business.  In the future he wishes to continue with his bakery but also expand it and be able to add another level to his house for his four children who are 13, 10, 6 and 4 years old.

loans.use: Flour, butter, sugar

loans.name: Divina Misericordia 3 & 4 Group

texts.en:
Quelsi is the coordinator of her group Divina Misericordia 3 & 4, (Divine Mercy). She lives in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their four children. She said her most difficult challenge is to finish building her house. Quelsi is excited about her fourth loan with Esperanza. She has had her business for approximately two years, starting with her first loan. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying vegetables and fruits. She will use the profits to buy a freezer and build a bathroom for her house. She hopes to see her children become professionals.

This Esperanza associate story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti) clients. Her group is located in Santiago, an area known for tobacco and beef production.  Santiago is the second biggest city in the Dominican Republic. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity.

loans.use: To buy vegetables and fruits

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
Sandra forma parte del banco comunal “Pueblo de Indios Emprende”,  perteneciente a la comuna de San Vicente de Tagua Tagua, en donde ocupa el cargo de presidenta. Ella tiene un almacén de abarrotes, confites, helados y máquinas de juegos, hace dos años, en su casa. Sandra atiende sola su negocio y esta actividad es el único sustento económico para su hogar compuesto por ella y sus dos hijos, de 10 y 5 años. Además prepara pasteles, hot dogs y sándwiches de churrascos y otros agregados para vender los fines de semana. 
Con este préstamo comprará mercadería en general. Su sueño es tener una cafetería, en donde también pudiera vender colaciones, para lo que ya cuenta con un terreno que heredó, bien ubicado para lo que quiere y con un subsidio para tener ahí mismo una casa, dentro de aproximadamente un año. Menciona que de Fondo Esperanza ha recibido mucha motivación para superarse en su negocio. 
San Vicente de Tagua Tagua es una comuna de la zona central de Chile, perteneciente a la región del Libertador General Bernardo O’higgins, emplazada a orillas del río Estero Zamorano. Su principal fuente económica se basa en la producción de limones, naranjas y paltas.
texts.en:
Sandra is part of the village bank "Pueblo de Indios Emprende," which serves the town of San Vicente de Tagua Tagua, where she is the president. She has a store selling groceries, candies, and ice cream and also has has video games. Sandra is the only one that works in her store, which has economically sustained her household of two children, ages 10 and 5. In addition, she makes cakes, hot dogs, and steak sandwiches and other items to sell on weekends. 

With this loan she will buy more merchandise. Her dream is to have a cafeteria where she can serve lunch on land that she inherited. It is in a good location for what she wants and a subsidy has allowed her to have a house within the next year or so. Fondo Esperanza has given her a lot of motivation to improve her business. 

San Vicente de Tagua Tagua is a town in the central part of Chile belonging to the Libertador General Bernardo O'Higgins region, located on the shore of the Estero Zamorano river. Its principal economic sources comes from the cultivation of limes, oranges, and avocados.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store

loans.name: Marcia Leonor

texts.es: Marcia Leonor tiene 38 años, es una madre soltera por lo que tiene 3 hijos. Su actividad económica es la venta de mercadería en general. Por lo que no es la primera vez que tiene financiamientos. Por más de 5 años que tiene este negocio pues ha sido su principal fuente de ingresos para su hogar.  Pues siempre ha sido una madre responsable, que se preocupa por su familia la mayoría de sus clientes viven cerca de su vivienda y con otros tiene que recorrer distancias muy largas. Desea mantener este negocio activo.
texts.en: Marcia Leonor is a 38-year-old single mother of three children. She sells general merchandise, and for this reason this is not the first time she's had funds. She has had this business for over five years, which has been her principal source of household income. She has always been a responsible mother and looked after her family. The majority of her customers live hear her home but others come from much further distances. She wishes to keep her store in business.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Alba

texts.es:
La  Sra.  Alba tiene 41 años de edad  es madre soltera con dos hijos uno ya mayor de edad  y otro en edad escolar.   
	 Esta señora teje frazadas y manteles artesanales y ella misma se encarga de venderlos en la localidad de Capiatá en donde viaja cada mes a colocar y cobrar sus productos, gracias  a su trabajo y esfuerzo pudo brindarles a sus hijos todas las comodidades y a la vez hacerles estudiar. 
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de hilo y color para tejer hamacas que en ésta temporada lo solicitan mucho sus clientes.
texts.en:
Alba is a 41-year-old single mother of two children, one of whom is older and the other who is school-age. 

She sews blankets and curtains and sells them in Capiatá, where she travels every month to display and sell her products. Thanks to her hard work she is able to provide her children with all of the comforts of home and also allow them to continue their studies. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase thread and color to sew hammocks, which many of her customers are asking for this season.

loans.use: to purchase thread and thread color

loans.name: Juana Del Rocio

texts.es:
Juana de 39 años,  ella vende productos Yambal (empresa que ofrece a mujeres emprendedoras comenzar con sus ventas independientes), vive en el Guasmo de Guayaquil (lugar caracterizado porque la mayor parte de sus habitantes son comerciantes informales). 

Realiza su trabajo sola para poder mantener a sus dos hijo, trabaja desde muy temprano ofreciendo los productos a sus vecinos y amigos, vende perfumes desde $ 10.00 hasta $ 55.00 c/u. una de las preocupaciones que tiene es dejar solo a su hijo con su mama, mientras que sale a trabajar. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar productos Yambal como perfumes, cremas, desodorantes. En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa y darle una buena a su hijo.
texts.en:
Juana is 39 years old and sells Yambal Products.  Yambal is a company which provides female entrepreneurs with the opportunity to make their own independent sales.  She lives in Guasmo de Guayaquil (a place which is noted for the fact that most of its inhabitants are informal merchants).

Working alone, she provides for her two children.  She works from very early in the morning, offering products to her neighbors and friends.  She sells perfume for $10.00 to $55.00. One of the worries she has is having to leave her son alone with her mother while she goes out to work.

With her loan she would like to buy Yambal Products such as perfume, creams and deodorants. In the future she would like to be able to finish building her house and provide the best for her children.

loans.use: Perfumes, creams

loans.name: Martha Alicia

texts.es:
Martha, reside en la ciudad de San Miguel, se dedica a la venta de verduras y tiene 23 años, Ella vive con sus padres, es madre soltera de una niña de 8 años, su horario de atención es de 6:00am hasta las 4:00pm, aprendió este negocio por su madre quien le enseño a administrarlo.
Martha solicita un préstamo para la inversión de frutas y verduras, considerando que una inversión en este momento le ayudaría a fortalecer sus ventas y sus ingresos, ya que depende de este negocio para mantenerse y mantener a su hija.
Ella quiere tener un negocio más estable con mayor afluencia de clientes, así mismo mejorar las condiciones de su familia.
texts.en:
Martha lives in the city of San Miguel and she sells vegetables for a living. She is 23 years old and she lives with her parents. She is a single mother of an 8-year old girl. She works from 6am to 4pm and she learned the business from her mother. She taught her how to run the business.  Martha requests a loan to invest in the purchase of fruits and vegetables. An investment in her business at this time will help her solidify her sales and improve her earnings. She depends on this business to support herself and her daughter.

She wants to have a more stable business with a larger client base. She also wants to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Creciendo Para El Futuro 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Adriana, a single mother with one child, is the coordinator of her group Creciendo para el futuro 1, 2 & 3, (Growing for the Future). She makes her home here in a simple structure and is working hard to take care of her son.

Having repaid her previous loan and grown her business, Adriana is excited to be taking her fifth loan with Esperanza. She has had her business for around three years, cooking foods and delivering them to people. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying a freezer, and will use additional profits to save and buy a computer for her son. In the near short future, she wants to build her house.

This Esperanza associate began with us because the loans are for business and her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti) clients generally. Her group is located in Samana, a lush rugged peninsula with a nascent tourism industry. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity.

loans.use: To buy a freezer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Work Tool Maintenance

loans.name: Mujeres En Desarrollo Group

texts.es:
el grupo Mujeres en Desarrollo esta ubicado en la Aldea Santa Cruz de la ciudad de Choluteca, lo integran 4 mujeres que son muy trabajadoras y dedicadas a sus familias, a continuacion se detallan las diferentes actividades que ellas realizan;

la señora Olga Sofia P. se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo diario, tiene una pequeña pulperia en su casa de habitacion, su negocio se encuentra en un lugar de facil acceso para la mayoria de personas que viven en su misma aldea, esto hace que sea muy visitado y que sus ingresos sean buenos ademas cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo que tambien es comerciante, juntos se ayudan en todos los gastos del hogar.

la señora Cecilia C. se dedica a la produccion y venta de tortillas, tiene varios años de realizar este tipo de actividad.
sus clientes son personal que trabaja en la Azucarera la Grecia, les entrega las tortillas por encargo todos los dias y tambien abastece a la mayoria de personas que viven en su comunidad.
Cecilia cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo para sacar adelante su familia.

la señora Felicidad M. se dedica a la venta de nacatamales, vende su producto en la comunidad donde reside y fuera de la misma, Felicidad se levanta todos los dia a las 4 de la mañana para salir a tiempo con el producto y luego venderlo,  tambien cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo y el se dedica a la  agricultura y esto hace que sus ingresos sean muy buenos.

la señora Alba P. se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo diario, tiene una pulperia en su casa de habitacion, su negocio es bien visitado por personas vecinas a su casa y personas que trabajan en las meloneras.
Alba trabaja muy fuerte para darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, es una mujer muy honrada, seria 
y de buenos principios morales.

el credito lo utilizaran para la compra de materiales y mercaderias para sus negocios.
texts.en:
The Women in Development group is located in the village of Santa Cruz in the city of Choluteca. It consists of four women who are very hardworking and dedicated to their families. The different activities they perform are detailed below:

Mrs. Olga Sofia P. is dedicated to the sale of dairy products and has a small grocery store in her home. Her business is in a location easily accessible to most people in her village, which explains the large number of customers. Since her income is good she has the support of her husband who is also a businessman. They help each other manage all household expenses.

Mrs. Cecilia C. is dedicated to the production and sale of tortillas, and has been performing this type of activity for several years. Her customers are employees working in La Grecia sugar factory. Every day she delivers tortillas on request and also supplies the majority of people living in their community.
Cecilia has the support of her husband in helping their family make progress.

Mrs. Felicidad M. is dedicated to the sale of nacatamales (a large variety of tamal typical of Honduras), selling her products in the community where she lives and outside of it. Felicidad gets up every day at 4 am to leave on time with her products and then sells them. She too has the support of her husband who is a farmer. As a result their joint income is quite good.

Mrs. Alba P. is dedicated to the sale of dairy products and has a small grocery store in her home. Her business is well attended by people in the surrounding area and people working in the melon plantations.
Alba works very hard to bring a better quality of life to her family. She's a very honest woman, serious-minded and with sound moral principles.

The loan will be used to purchase materials and goods for their businesses.

loans.use: purchase of wood, lime, sugar, yeast, corn, chicken, soft drinks, rice, butter, oil, beans, toilet paper, juice, sardines, pasta, soups, sausages, dairy products, milk, eggs, soaps, cakes, candles, matches , batteries, margarine,

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Rosmery Yanira

texts.es:
Rosmery, tiene 31 años D. edad, resiD. en San Francisco Gotera donD. vive con su esposo y su hija, ellos viven alquilando casa y se dedica a la venta D. enchiladas, tostadas D. plátano y pastelitos D. papa, por la mañana las venD. cerca D. su casa y al mediodía se coloca en las afueras D. una escuela donD. todos los alumnos le compran.
Ella necesita un préstamo para comprar materiales para desarrollar su venta, como plátano verD., papas, Maíz y condimentos, esto ayudara a que ella pueda producir más e incrementar su ventas.
Su propósito es contar con los ingresos que solventen sus necesidades y ayudar a su hija para que pueda estudiar y tenga mayores oportunidades D. progresar.
texts.en:
Rosmery is 31 years old and she lives in San Francisco Got era together with her husband and their daughter. They live in a rented house and she sells prepared foods such as enchiladas, baked bananas, and potato patties. In the mornings she sells her products near her home, next to a school where the students buy from her. 

She needs a loan to purchase ingredients to make foods to sell, such as plantain bananas, potatoes, corn, and condiments. This will help her produce more and increase her sales.  Her goal is to have enough income to cover her needs and those of her daughter. She wants to send her daughter to school and to have better opportunities for development.

loans.use: To purchase bananas, corn, and potatoes.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.es:
Don Samuel de 39 años de edad, reside en Usulután con su familia su esposa e hijas, tienen 15 años de vivir en ese lugar, se dedica a la siembra de Maíz desde hace 10 años también le gusta la ganadería.
El quiere comprar un motor de bombeo y abono para la milpa, y está solicitando un préstamo para realizar esta inversión, ya que al contar con el motor podrá regar la milpa durante el verano dándole un mejor cuido para que se desarrolle y crezca sanamente.
Quiere cancelar este préstamo y progresar con sus cultivos para llevar a su familia la alimentación y los ingresos necesarios para subsistir.
texts.en:
Samuel is 39 years old and he lives in Usulutan with his family, his wife and daughters. He has lived in the same place for 15 years. He has had his corn plantation for 10 years and he also enjoys cattle farming. 

He wants to purchase a water pump and fertilizer for his farmland. He requests a loan to carry out this investment. With the water pump he will be able to water his plantation in the summer, providing better care for its healthy development. 

He endeavors to pay off his loan and to advance with his plantations. He will be able to feed his family and cover their living expenses.

loans.use: To purchase a water pump and fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase drinks and ingredients.

loans.name: Martha Johanna

texts.es: Martha Johanna tiene 22 años es una joven muy emprendedora y disfruta mucho de su actividad  que es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 3 años que tiene este negocio que lo inicio por medio de la venta de ropa pues inicio poco a poco por lo que se ha caracterizado por conocer muy bien a sus clientes y ofrecer un excelente servicio esto es lo que atrae a la mayoría de personas que es muy responsable y dinámica. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de sabanas, toallas, manteles, ropa interior, cosméticos, ropa en general entre otras cosas.
texts.en:
Martha Johanna, age 22, is a very enterprising young woman.  She greatly enjoys her work, which is selling general merchandise.  She has had this business for over three years.  She started the business by selling clothes.  Little by little she has become known for knowing her customers very well and for her excellent service.  This is what attracts most of the people; she is very responsible and dynamic.

She is requesting the loan to buy sheets, towels, tablecloths, underwear, cosmetics, and general clothing, among other things.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Alfonsa

texts.es:
Doña Alfonsa tiene 61 años de edad  está casada hace mas 30 años  tiene 4 hijos ya mayores de edad.  
	 La Sra. Alfonsa se dedica hace 35 años a esta actividad,  teje frazadas y manteles artesanales y ella misma se encarga de venderlos ya que  la mayoría de sus hijos viven por la capital ella le lleva su producto para comercializarlo, viaja una vez al mes y le resulta muy rentable su producto,  gracias  a su trabajo y esfuerzo pudo brindarles a sus hijos todas las comodidades y a la vez hacerle estudiar. 
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de hilo y color para tejer hamacas que en ésta temporada lo solicitan mucho sus clientes.
texts.en:
Alfonsa, age 61, has been married for over 30 years.  She has four grown children.

Alfonsa has been weaving handmade blankets and tablecloths for 35 years. She sells them herself because most of her children live by that money.   She travels once a month, and she is able to earn a very good profit with her products. Thanks to her work and effort, she has been able to provide her children with all of the basic comforts and also pay for their education. 

She is requesting the loan to buy thread and dye in order to weave hammocks, which her customers request a lot during this season.

loans.use: Buy thread and dye

loans.name: Las Flores 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Aureliana is the coordinator of her group Las FLores 1&2 (The Flower). She lives in a simple structure with her husband and their two children.  Aureliana is excited about her second loan with Kiva partner, Esperanza, after having successfully repaid her previous loan and expanded her business. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by purchasing clothing, cosmetics products, and shoes in the main market in Santiago, and then bringing them back to her community to sell at a profit. She will use her profits to invest in her business as well as to buy a computer for her children. She intends to invest in her home by building a concrete structure.

Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients (many of whom recently emigrated to the Dominican Republic from Haiti). Her group is located in Santiago, an area famous for tobacco and beef production.  Santiago is the second largest city in the Dominican Republic, where running water (none of which is potable) and electricity are unreliable.

loans.use: To buy miscellaneous products

loans.name: Armando

texts.es:
El jóven Armando tiene 22 años de edad es soltero y vive con su madre en la ciudad de Carapegua. 
    	Como proviene de una familia humilde y con ganas de salir adelante empezó a trabajar como empleado en una distribuidora de bebidas luego de 4 años de ahorrar  decidió emprender un pequeño negocio, que es un lavadero de vehículo a lado  de su casa, hoy en día  ya tiene una buena clientela formada.
 Gracias a su trabajo y esfuerzo ahora está ampliando su lavadero  y así mantener la buena clientela.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de equipos (aspiradora y otros que le hace  Falta).
texts.en:
Armando is a single, 22 year old young man.  He lives with his mother in the city of Carapegua.  As he comes from a humble family, and he has the desire to get ahead, he started working for a drink distributor.  

After four years of saving he decided to undertake a small business, a carwash on the side of his house.  He now has a good customer base.  Thanks to his work and effort he is now expanding his carwash.  That way he keeps good customers.

He is requesting the loan to buy equipment (vacuum cleaner and other equipment that he needs).

loans.use: Buy equipment for his carwash

loans.name: Albertina

texts.es:
Albertina es socia del Banco Comunal “Estrellitas de Oro II”, ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia Puno, departamento de Puno, tiene 56 años de edad, de estado civil casada, tiene grado de instrucción primaria incompleta.  Albertina vive con sus cuatro hijos.
La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos  desde hace un año, el primer préstamo solicitado fue de S/ 500.00 nuevo soles, con el cual pudo incrementar el capital de  su negocio de venta de casacas.
Ahora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 Nuevo soles,  préstamo que le servirá para incrementar la mercadería de su negocio, es decir, comprará más casacas al por mayor.
Su sueño es crecer en su negocio. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la ganancia de los ahorros.
texts.en:
Albertina is a member of the “Estrellitas de Oro II” community bank which is located in the district of Puno, in the province and administrative district of the same name.  She is 56 years old, married and did not complete her primary education.  Albertina lives with her four children.

This lady has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for one year.  The first loan which she requested was for 500.00 nuevos soles with which she managed to increase her business capital. Her business is selling jackets.

She is now requesting a new loan for 1000.00 nuevos soles which will allow her to increase her merchandise, that is to say she will buy more jackets wholesale.

Her dream is to expand her business.  What she likes about the community bank is the interest made on savings.

loans.use: Purchase of jackets wholesale

loans.name: Ceneida

texts.es:
Ceneida es estudiante de la UNA y está cursando el 1er. Año en Lic. en Obstetricia, ella tiene el deseo de ser una exitosa profesional en el futuro para poder ayudar a sus padres, ya que la economía de sus padres algunas veces ya es poca para cubrir los gastos que demanda dicho estudio.
El crédito que está solicitando es para la compra de libros y uniformes y algunos herramientas necesarias para las prácticas como la toma presión, y otros.
texts.en:
Cereida is a student at UNA and is completing her first year of study in obstetrics.  Her goal is to become a successful professional in the future so that she can help her parents, since their financial situation is sometimes demanding when they have to cover the cost of her studies.

She is asking for this loan in order to pay for books, uniforms, and a few other tools, such as a blood pressure cuff and other items.

loans.use: Books and uniforms

loans.name: Santos Marta

texts.es:
la señora Santos Marta E. tiene 59 años de edad, vive en la aldea Agua Caliente de la ciudad de Choluteca, se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo popular, tiene una pulperia en su casa de habitacion, su negocio se
encuentra en un lugar donde la fluides de personas es bastante, esto hace que sus ventas sean buenas y que sus ingresos sean muy favorables, ademas lucha junto a su esposo para sacar adelante su hogar.
Esta aldea es muy productiva ya que se cultiva bastante granos basicos como ser maiz y frijol. 
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia para surtir mas su negocio.
texts.en:
Mrs. Santos Marta E. is 59 years old and lives in the Agua Caliente area of Choluteca.  She sells popular consumable items and has a general store located within her home.  Her business is in a location where many people pass and her sales and income are good.  She and her husband work together to move ahead.

This area is very productive and large amounts of basic grains (corn and beans) are grown there.  She will use the money from this loan to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.use: Inventory

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Blanca

texts.es: Blanca, de 38 años, vive a lado de su esposo José de 38 años, que es taxista y de sus 2 pequeños hijos, juntos cada día se esfuerzan por salir adelante. Desde muy joven esta trabajadora mujer siempre se dedicó a trabajar para ayudar a su familia. En la actualidad también continua trabajando, pues ella se considera una “mil oficios”, con capacidad para emprender nuevos negocios y hacer crecer el capital que tiene, y ya no vende turrones, como en otras épocas, pues ahora comercializa productos de belleza de una reconocida marca a nivel mundial, y tiene clientes fijos que le piden mercadería con frecuencia.  Ya que ella tiene un gran carisma y es muy persuasiva vende bastante y obtiene regulares ganancias. Paralelamente a este trabajo también se dedica a la venta de hamburguesas afuera de su casa y cuenta con la ayuda de sus hijos para la atención de estos platillos. Está muy satisfecho pues ambos negocio le proporcionan regulares ganancias y ayuda a su esposo en los constantes gastos del hogar; además como es una mujer emprendedora para el futuro tiene planeado instalar un pequeño bazar en su casa pues quiere mejorar sus ganancias. Es el sexto crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible el dinero que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Blanca tiene planeado invertir  el crédito solicitado en la compra algunos productos de belleza  que se encuentran en stock para aumentar sus ganancias; asimismo de ingredientes que necesita para continuar preparando sus hamburguesas.
texts.en: Blanca, 38, lives with her husband Jose, 38, who is a taxi driver, and their 2 small children. Everyday they work together just to keep their family going. From a young age, this working woman has always dedicated herself to work in order to help her family. She continues to work, and is  currently considered a jack-of-all-trades, able to start new businesses and grow profits.  Unlike before, she no longer sells candies. Now she sells beauty products from a worldwide recognized brand. She has regular customers who frequently request her merchandise. Since she has great charisma and is very persuasive, she makes frequent sales and consistent profits. In addition to this work, she also sells burgers outside her home with the help of her children who wash the dishes. She is very pleased to have businesses which provides a regular income to help her husband in the ongoing household expenses. As a woman entrepreneur, she has plans for the future to install a small shop in her home to improve profits. This is her sixth loan with MFP and she promises to pay her installments on time.  She does not want to look bad to people who made the loan possible, as these loans have allowed her to continue working towards success. Blanca plans to invest the requested loan in beauty supplies to increase her profits as well as the ingredients needed to prepare the burgers she sells.

loans.use: Beauty supply products

loans.name: Karla Marilet

texts.es: Karla tiene 36 años, pues no es la primera vez que tiene financiamientos, este negocio de brindar el servicio de costura, pues es una persona muy alegre ya que la necesidad de sufragar ingresos para su hogar pues tiene 3 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. La mayoría de sus prendas de vestir son de muy buena calidad, Desde joven le ha gustado trabajar y mantener a su familia, ya que depende mucho de su trabajo gracias a su esfuerzo y ahorro pudo adquirir este medio de vida. Sin embargo los desafíos que enfrenta como son el tiempo que le solicitan las prendas de vestir en corto tiempo, pues trabaja día y noche para no tener problemas y entregarlos en tiempo y forma. Ella solicita este financiamiento para capital de trabajo que será destinado para la compra de agujas, tijeras, hilos, telas.
texts.en:
This isn’t the first time that 36-year old Karla has had a loan. She earns her living from her sewing business. She is a cheerful woman, responsible for raising her three young children, so she needs money to run her household. 

Most of the clothing Karla makes is of very good quality. Since she was a young person, she has enjoyed working and supporting her family. Thanks to her hard work and savings, she was able to acquire the business. However, she does face some challenges such as when people put in an order for clothing and expect the items to be ready immediately. She works night and day so as not to have problems and to deliver the garments on time. 

Karla is asking for a loan to buy needles, scissors, thread and fabric.

loans.use: to buy items for her sewing business

loans.name: Carlos Beltran

texts.es:
el señor Carlos A. es una persona que dedica a la actividad de venta de abarroteria en general. la cual la realiza a medio tiempo ya que tambien trabaja como maestro en un centro basico cercano a su comunidad.
cuando el no esta en el negocio lo atiende su esposa, mutuamente trabajan muy fuerte para sacar sus hijos adelante.
Carlos y su esposa son personas bien honradas y responsables.
el credito lo utilizara para comprar mas mercaderia y asi surtir su negocio.
texts.en:
Señor Carlos A. earns his living running a general grocery store part-time. He also works as a teacher at a centre near where he lives. When he is not at the store, his wife looks after the business. Together they work hard to make a good life for their children.

Both Carlos and his wife are honest and responsible people. The loan will be used to buy more stock for the store.

loans.use: to buy stock for his store such as eggs, milk, rice, bread etc.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Reina

texts.es:
la señora Reina E. tiene 44 años de edad, vive en la aldea Agua Caliente de la ciudad de Choluteca, Reina se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo popular, tiene una pulperia en su casa de habitacion, el cual esta ubicado en el centro de la aldea, esto hace que la afluencia de personas sea mucha.
Reina cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo que es agricultor y albañil.
Reina tambien tiene un molino para moler maiz en donde muchas personas de la camunidad utilizan este servicio.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia para surtir mas su negocio.
texts.en:
44-year old Señora Reina E. lives in the village of Aqua Caliente near the town of Choluteca. She sells basic supplies from a small grocery store in her home which is located in the centre of the village so a lot of people go there. Reina’s husband, a farmer and builder, also helps her. 

As well as the store, Reina has a mill for grinding corn. Many people in the community use this service.

The loan will be used to buy more stock for the store.

loans.use: to buy stock for her store such as meats, chicken, rice, beans etc.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Estrellas De Atipiri Group

texts.es:
La A.C. Estrellas de Atipiris ya cuenta con 12 ciclos  de antigüedad, es parte del Centro Focal de Senkata.  Está compuesta por ocho integrantes, siete mujeres y un varón.  Las socias consideran que las reuniones son espacios en los que también aprovechan para compartir en el grupo.  La mesa directiva está compuesta por la  presidenta,  una tesorera y una secretaria de actas.

La señora  Dora es una mujer de 42 años de edad, casada, con cinco hijos,  las señoras consideraron que era la persona adecuada para el cargo.

Con respecto a su negocio, ella cuenta con un  Restaurant en su mismo domicilio, comenta que el plato que mejor le sale es el “bistec”.  Está en este negocio desde hace un tiempo, cuenta con el apoyo de su cuñado.  Este crédito de $us 200.-, está destinado para la compra de un refrigerador, ella espera que esta compra le facilite la conservación de carne y otros productos que se descomponen con rapidez cuando se encuentra a la temperatura del medio ambiente.

Con respecto a los negocios  que llevan adelante el resto de integrantes de la asociación, tenemos: venta de cocinas, restaurant, tiendas de barrio, chofer, pensión
texts.en:
The Estrellas de Atipiris Communal Association has already completed 12 loan cycles. They are part of the Senkata Regional Office. The group is made up of eight people: seven women and one man. The members believe the meetings also provide an opportunity for them to come together as a group. The committee is made up of the president, a treasurer and a secretary.

Mrs Dora is a 42-year-old woman. She is married with five children and the other women considered her to be the most suitable person for the post. With respect to her business, she has a restaurant in her home. She comments that her most successful dish is steak. She has been in this business for some time and she has the support of her brother-in-law. This loan of $200 is to be used for the purchase of a refrigerator. She hopes that this purchase will help her to preserve the meat and other products which spoil quickly when they are at room temperature.

As regards the businesses of the other members of the association, they are: stove selling, a restaurant, neighborhood stores, a driver and a guest house.

loans.use: Purchase of a refrigerator

loans.name: Wilson

texts.es:
El Sr. Wilson C. Sosa tiene  30 años , su pareja se llama Antonia Mercedes Romero y tiene 31 años de edad. Los mismos poseen 3 hijos, 2 nenas de 7 y 6 años respectivamente que actualmente están iniciando su estudios primarios , y un varón de 2 años.
El Sr. Wilson se dedica a la compra- venta de papeles de todo tipo. El mismo recorre comprando los papeles mal cortados y reciclados de las imprentas, papelerías y otros negocios. 
El Sr. Wilson se encarga junto a su esposa de la selección de los papeles como ser : papel blanco, en colores , escritos y cartón.
Una vez seleccionado vende los papeles a las recicladoras mayoristas.
El Sr. Wilson desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de mayor cantidad de papeles para tener mayor rotación de sus mercaderías y obtener mayores ganancias con ellas.
texts.en:
Mr Wilson C. Sosa is 30 years old.  His partner is called Antonia Mercedes Romero and she is 31 years old.  The couple have three children: two girls, ages 7 and 6, who are currently beginning their primary education and a 2-year-old boy.

Mr Wilson buys and sells all types of paper.  He travels around buying badly-cut paper and recycled paper from printing companies, stationery stores and other businesses.

Mr Wilson and his wife sort through the paper, for example: white paper, colored paper, documents and cardboard.

Once sorted, he sells the paper to wholesale recycling companies.

Mr Wilson would like to invest his loan in the purchase of more paper in order to have a higher turnover of his goods and achieve higher profits from them.

loans.use: Purchase of paper

loans.name: Carolina

texts.es:
la sra. Carolina A. se dedica a la vanta de ropa en general, actividad que realiza desde hace 6 años, Carolina distribuye ropa en su aldea y en otras aldeas cercanas a su comunidad.
su esposo es agricultor y juntos se ayudan mutuamente para cubrir con los gastos del hogar.
Carolina es una persona muy honrada y trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante a su hijos,
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de ropa y asi tener mas ventas. las ganancias las necesita para sacar adelante a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Carolina A. works selling clothing in general, a business she has had for six years. Carolina distributes clothing in her own neighborhood and in neighboring areas of her community. 

Her husband is a farmer and together they help each other in order to cover the household expenses. 

Carolina is a highly honorable person and works very hard to put her children ahead. 

She will use the loan to purchase clothing and thus make more sales. She requires the earnings to get her children ahead.

loans.use: To purchase clothing for men, women and children

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Ilsen Maria

texts.es: Ilsen de 29 años es una joven muy entusiasta. Inicio hace 9 años atrás vendiendo muy pocos productos como ropa y cosméticos más tarde, como le genero buenos ingreso decidió invertir una parte de las ganancias en mercadería variada  Poco a poco con esfuerzo pudo surtir su negocio. En la actualidad trabaja desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche.  Aunque la venta de contado le genera mejores ganancias ella también le gusta vender de manera ambulante así le da oportunidad de conocer a mas clientes. Ella quiere comprar con el préstamo ropa, cosméticos, calzado y toallas para venderla a sus vecinos y así tener un ingreso adicional. En el futuro quiere tener su negocio más estable y seguro.
texts.en:
Ilsen, 29, is a very enthusiastic young woman. Nine years ago she began selling just a few products such as clothing and cosmetics. Later as this generated a good income she decided to invest part of the earnings in a variety of merchandise. Little by little and with effort she was able to stock her business. Currently she works from 7 a.m. until 9 p.m. Although cash sales generate better earnings for her, she also likes to sell her merchandise as a street vendor as this gives her the opportunity to meet more customers. 

With the loan she wants to buy clothing, cosmetics, footwear and towels for selling to her neighbors and thus bring in additional income. In the future she wants to have a more stable, steady business.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Sonia Constanza

texts.es:
Sonia Constanza de 36 años vive en el barrio primavera de la ciudad de Bogotá con su cónyuge  y sus dos hijos en las edades de 8 y 16 años, allí en esa ciudad  Sonia tiene  un negocio llamado Café pastelería y derivados de la harina de trigo, el cual inició hace 5 años como panadería pero gradualmente lo ha ido remodelando y adicionándole  productos de cafetería y repostería, con esta adición quiere lograr mayor rentabilidad y ampliar la linea de postres que es muy apetecida y genera  un 40 % de utilidades. Con su credikiva, primer crédito con la Función Mario Santo Domingo Sonia comprara en mayor volumen, su materia prima e insumos, pues  se acerca  Diciembre, época en que  se aumentan  los  precios y comprando ahora se ahorra ese incremento. Igualmente quiere seguir fortaleciendo su linea de  productos  de panadería y repostería, aprovechando la época navideña, para crear alternativas de obsequios económicos a sus clientes, como el pan navideño,  pudines, tortas entre otros diseños propios de la época.
Su mayor reto es lograr posicionamiento en el mercado, aumentar sus ventas y lograr utilidades significativas que le apoyen su bienestar  personal y familiar interpretando la potencialidad del sector altamente comercial, donde se encuentra ubicada su microempresa.
texts.en:
Sonia Constanza, age 36, lives in the Primavera neighborhood of the city of Bogotá with her husband and two children, ages 8 and 16. Sonia has a business called Café, a pastry shop selling items derived from wheat flour. She began the business 5 years ago as a bread bakery but has gradually remodeled it, adding products for a coffee and pastry shop. With this change she wants to obtain greater profitability and enlarge her product line of desserts, which are very much in demand and generate a 40% profit.

With her Kiva loan, her first with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, Sonia will purchase a greater volume of raw materials and resources. December is approaching, a period jn which prices increase, and by buying now she avoids that increase. Also, she wants to continue to strengthen her product line of breads and pastries, taking advantage of the Christmas season to create economical gift choices for her customers, such as Christmas breads, puddings, and cakes, among other ideas appropriate for the season. Her greatest challenges are obtaining a position in the market, increasing her sales, obtaining significant profits that support her own and her family’s well-being, and meeting the potential of the highly commercial district where her small business is located.

loans.use: She will buy a greater volume of raw materials and resources.

loans.name: Filiberto

texts.es:
el señor Filiberto E. tiene 54 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de granos basicos como ser maiz, maisillo y frijoles.
Filiberto es una persona muy seria, honrada y muy trabajadora.
el adquiere su producto en su misma comunidad donde reside.
Filiberto lucha fuerte para sacar adelante a su familia.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de granos basicos.
texts.en:
Filiberto E. is 54 years old. His work is selling staple foods such as corn, millet and beans. Filiberto is a very serious, honorable and hard-working person. He acquires his products in the same community where he lives. 

Filiberto is working very hard to help his family get ahead. He will use the loan to buy staple foods.

loans.use: Buying corn, millet and beans

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: G.s Mexico Group

texts.es: La señora Yamileth C. tiene 31 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos de 5 y 13 años respectivamente. La señora se dedica a la producción y comercialización de pan, al por mayor y al detalle. Ella ya tiene 3 años de dedicarse a esta actividad, la cual nació debido a la falta de empleo que aquejaba a la familia y ya que su mama tenía el horno, ella decidió emprender en esta actividad. Ella solicita este préstamo con el objetivo de invertirlo en la compra de más materia prima, a ser invertido en la producción de pan. Otra integrante del grupo es Sicry Sandy, la cual tiene 27 años de edad, es casada y habita con su esposo trabaja como albañil. Ella además tiene 2 hijos de 5 y 8 años respectivamente. Sicry se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan simple, al por mayor y al detalle. Ella empezó con este negocio desde hace 3 años, que fue una época dura ya que su esposo en ese tiempo no encontraba trabajo por lo que decidieron dedicarse en ese tiempo al negocio. El negocio ella lo aprendió de su mama, la cual toda la vida se dedico a esa actividad. Ella solicita el crédito con el propósito de comprar insumos para la elaboración de pan, buscando como vender más.
texts.en: Mrs. Yamileth C. is 31 years old, married with two children of 5 and 13 years. She is devoted to the production and sale of bread, in wholesale and retail. She has been working in this activity for 3 years already, which she decided to do because of the lack of jobs for her family and because her mother had an oven. She is requesting this loan with the goal of investing in the purchase of raw material, used to produce bread. Another member of the group is Sicry Sandy, who is 27 years old, married and lives with her husband that works as a construction worker. She also has two children, 5 and 8 years old respectively. Sicry is dedicated to making and selling simple bread, in wholesale and retail. She started in this business 3 years ago, a hard time for her because her husband couldn't find a job then, so they decided to devote their time in this business. She learned the trade from her mother, who did this activity all her life. She is requesting this loan to purchase raw material for the production of bread, to try to sell more.

loans.use: to purchase raw material for making bread

loans.name: G.s. Los Guzmanes Group

texts.es: El señor Moisés Isaac tiene 34 años de edad, es soltero y aun no tiene hijos. El tiene en su casa una pulpería, la cual esta surtida con todo tipo de productos de granos básicos, golosinas, pan, etc. El señor ya tiene 2 años de tener este negocio, el cual dio inicio como una necesidad de generar un ingreso extra en la familia para el sustento del hogar. El solicita este crédito para comprar más mercaderías para el negocio y de esta manera, surtirlo más con productos nuevos que capten la atención de sus clientes. Pretende mediante este crédito incrementar la oferta de sus productos y así incrementar sus ventas. Otra integrante del grupo es Doña Candida Rosa, la cual tiene 47 años de edad, es casada. Su esposo trabaja como albañil. Ella además tiene 2 hijos de 19 y 25 años respectivamente. La señora Candida se dedica también al comercio de productos, ya que ella también posee una pulpería en su casa, la cual ya tiene más de 5 años de tenerla. Este negocio de pulpería nació como una necesidad para sustentar a la familia, ya que su esposo se había quedado desempleado y le costaba conseguir trabajos. Ella solicita este préstamo con el objetivo de compras más mercancías para la pulpería y vender más.
texts.en:
Moisés Isaac, age 34, is single and does not yet have children.  He has a grocery store in his house.  The store is stocked with all types of products like basic grains, sweets, and bread, etc.  He has had this business for two years.  He started it because he needed to generate extra family income to support his household.

He is requesting this loan to buy more merchandise for the business.  He will then stock it with more new products that capture the attention of his customers.  Through this loan he intends to increase the products that he sells.  That way he will increase his sales.

Candida Rosa is the other member of the group.  She is 47 years old and married.  Her husband works as a bricklayer.  She has two children, ages 19 and 25.

Candida is also a merchant.  She too has a grocery store in her house.  She has had the store for over five years.  This grocery business was born from the necessity of supporting the family.  Her husband was unemployed, and it was difficult for him to find work.

She is requesting this loan to buy more merchandise for her grocery store and to sell more.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Libertad Group

texts.es:
La A.C. Libertad ha pasado con éxito a su segundo  ciclo, es parte del Centro Focal de Villa Exaltación.  Está compuesta por nueve integrantes, ocho mujeres y un varón.  La mesa directiva está compuesta por la  presidenta la señora Rose Mary,  la tesorera  la señora Mirtha y la secretaria de actas la señora Doris.

La señora  Doris es una mujer de 41 años de edad, casada, con  tres hijos,  las señoras consideraron que era la persona adecuada para el cargo de secretaria de actas.

Con respecto a su negocio, ella comercia con mercadería de distinto tipo, la venta de la misma es a pagos, lo que recibe el nombre de Pasanaku, aprendió este trabajo hace doce años de su suegra.  Las ventas son realizadas de manera ambulante, en personas que se encuentran en las escuelas, en el mercado, todos los días por las tardes.  Este crédito de Bs. 2500.-, está destinado para la compra de mercadería.
Con respecto a los negocios  que llevan adelante el resto de integrantes de la asociación, tenemos: mecánico, venta de repuestos, venta de dulces, repartir víveres, tejido de manta, venta de mercadería en general, venta y flete de vestidos, venta de dulces, pensión - snack.
texts.en:
The “Libertad” (Liberty) Communal Bank has successfully completed its second cycle.  It is part of the Villa Exaltación Communal Center.  It is comprised of nine members; there are eight women and one man. The board of directors is comprised of Rose Mary, the president; Mirtha, the treasurer; and Doris, the secretary.

Doris is a 41 year old woman.  She is married and has three children.  The members considered her to be the right person to be the secretary.  She sells different types of merchandise, which is paid for in payments.  Her business is called Pasanaku.  She learned this work from her mother-in-law 12 years ago.  She sells in an itinerant manner to people she encounters at schools and at the market.  She works every afternoon.  This loan, for Bs. 2500, is to buy merchandise.

The businesses of the other communal bank members are:  mechanic, selling replacement parts, selling sweets, supply distribution, weaving blankets, selling general merchandise, selling and renting dresses, and a small eatery with snacks.

loans.use: To buy supplies

loans.name: Ruben Neptali

texts.es:
el señor Ruben Neptali P. tiene 25 años de edad, tiene casa propia, esta casado y dice sentirse muy feliz.
Ruben es empleado de Tropigas donde se desempeña como agente de ventas.
Ruben tiene 2 hijos por los cuales trabaja muy fuerte para sacarlos adelante, es muy responsable ademas cuenta con buenos principios morales y religiosos. varios vecinos a su casa de habitacion hablaron bien de el.
el credito lo utilizara para comprar materiales de construccion ya que desea remodelar su casa, esto es para darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Ruben Neptali P., 25, has his own home and is married and reports he feels very happy. 

Ruben is an employee of Tropigas [a butane gas supply company] where he works as a sales agent. 

Ruben has two children for whom he works very hard in order to get them ahead. He is very responsible and also has good moral and religious principles. Several of his neighbors spoke highly of him. 

He will use the loan to purchase construction materials since he wishes to remodel his house in order to give his children a better quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase cement, iron rods, lime, sand, rock

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Celia Del Carmen

texts.es:
la señora Celia B. tiene 62 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de abarroteria, tiene su negocio en su casa de habitacion el cual se encuentra en un punto de facil acceso para todas las personas, cuenta con el apoyo
de sus hijos para la atencion de sus clientes.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia, desea surtir mas su negocio y tener mayores ventas, las ganancias las necesita para salir adelante con sus hijos.
texts.en: Celia B. is 62 years old and she has a grocery store. She has the business in a section of her home where customers can easily access. Her children help her with the costumer support aspect of the business. The loan will be used to purchase merchandise, wishing to increase the variety in her business in order to obtain better sales. She needs her profits to support her children.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Lorena Del Pilar

texts.es: Lorena Del Pilar de 43 años, vive junto a su esposo, así mismo junto a dos hijos menores de edad, quienes se dedican a estudiar, Lorena tiene su negocio que es brindar el servicio de costura. El negocio cuenta con muy buena ubicación,  en su vivienda debido a que se encuentra en un lugar en donde es muy transitado por muchos clientes  lo que la hace muy visible para muchas personas, esto le beneficia en gran manera, ya que le permite contar con muchos clientes fijos. Lorena solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar tela, hilos, tijeras y material necesario. Este negocio es de mucho valor para ella ya que es una fuente de ingresos muy importante para el sostenimiento de su familia.
texts.en: Lorena Del Pilar is 43 years old and she lives together with her husband and with their two young children. They are both going to school. Lorena has a tailoring shop and it is very well located. She lives in a very well traveled region and it is very visible to many people. This is of great benefit and she has earned a great many steady clients. Lorena requests a loan to purchase fabrics, thread, scissors and other necessary materials. Her business is of tremendous value to her because it is a very important source of income for her family.

loans.use: To use as working capital.

loans.name: Reina Esperanza

texts.es:
la señora Reina G. es una mujer honrada, trabajadora y de buenos principios,  dedicada a su actividad la cual es la venta de ropa para cama, tiene mucha clientela, Reina viaja a la frontera de Guasaule a comprar su mercaderia, ahi es mas barata y de mejor calidad.
sus clientes le hacen varios pedidos, pero no tiene tanto capital para comprar la mercaderia y luego venderla al credito.
el credito lo utilizara para comprar mas mercaderia al por mayor, asi no tendra que viajar mas seguido. 
Reina cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo, juntos trabajan duro para salir adelante con sus hijos.
texts.en: Reina G. is a very honest woman. She is hard working and has sound principles. She sells bedding and she has a good client base. Reina travels to the border of Guasaule to purchase the merchandise which is always at a better price and of a better quality. Her clients place various orders but she doesn't have enough capital funds to fill their orders for later resale. The loan will be used to purchase more merchandise in wholesale and not have to travel as often.  Reina has her husband's support and together they work to support their children.

loans.use: To purchase bedding for resale.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Benigna

texts.es:
Benigna es socia del Banco Comunal “Mujeres Clavelinas”, ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia de EL Collao, Departamento de Puno, tiene36 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, con  seis  hijos, tiene grado de instrucción secundaria completa.
Benigna viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 2 años, el primer préstamo solicitado fue de S/300.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que  sirvió para la compra y engorde de animales menores como cerdos y ovejas.
Ahora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/ 2500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que le servirá para incrementar el capital de  su negocio,  no solamente de animales menores sino también de mayores como el engorde de ganado vacuno.
Su sueño es que su negocio sea más grande y que pueda convertirse en una mayorista.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las ganancias del ahorro y las charlas realizadas por la promotora.
texts.en:
Benigna is a member of the community bank named "Mujeres Clavelinas". It is located in the district of Ilave of the province of Colla in Puno. She is 36 years old and she lives with her common-law partner and their six children. She is a high school graduate.

Benigna has been a member of the Manuela Ramos movement (Kiva Field Partner) for the past 2 years. The first loan she requested was in the amount of 300 nuevos soles and it was invested in the purchase of livestock, such as pigs and sheep. 

She requests a new loan in the amount of 2500 nuevos soles to use as working capital for her business. She wants to raise not only small livestock animals but cattle as well. 

Her dream is to see her business expand and become a wholesaler.  What she most enjoys about her community bank is the ability to save money and the talks that are given by the facilitators.

loans.use: To expand the herd of cattle.

loans.name: Elbia Antonia

texts.es:
la señora Elbia A. tiene 59 años de edad, vive en el Barrio el Portillo de la ciudad de Choluteca, Elbia se dedica a la venta de cosmeticos en general, tiene una gran mayoria de clientes los cuales le encargan
productos todos los meses, esto hace que tenga un buen movimiento de su mercaderia.
el credito lo utilizara para comprar mas cosmeticos al por mayor.
Elbia distribuye su producto en San Marcos.
las ganancias las necesita para cubrir con los gastos del hogar.
texts.en: Elbia A. is 59 years old and she lives in the community of El Portillo, in the city of Choluteca. Elbia sells cosmetics in general. She has a large client base that place orders for products every month. The merchandise she has sees quite a lot of movement.  The loan will be used to purchase more cosmetics in wholesale. Elbia distributes her products in San Marcos.  The profits she earns are used to cover her household expenses.

loans.use: To purchase various cosmetic items.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase groceries for resale.

loans.name: Ivania

texts.es: La señora Ivania F. M., tiene la edad de 41 años, habita en el Barrio Laureles Norte, es casada, y su esposo labora como conductor, apoyando a los gastos del hogar, tiene 2 hijos uno es pequeño de 4 años y el otros de 14 años, ellos estudian la escuela secundaria y el preescolar respectivamente, ella es administradora de su propio negocio de venta de productos domésticos, personales, abarrotes, ella comenzó su negocio, gracias a su esfuerzo propio, ella era maestra de primaria, y con sus ahorros y liquidación, inicio su negocio, ellos habitan en una humilde casa, y es para su hogar que solicitan un préstamo para la compra de materiales de construcción  que permitan edificar un muro en la parte trasera de su hogar, que favorezca a la seguridad y comodidad del pequeño sobretodo por que el juega en esa zona de la casa.
texts.en:
Mrs Ivania F. M. is 41 years old and lives in the Laureles Norte neighborhood. She is married and her husband works as a driver, supporting the household expenses. They have two children: one is only four years old and the other 14. They go respectively to pre-school and high school.

She runs her own business selling household products, personal items and groceries. She began her business through her own efforts; prior to that she was a schoolteacher and thanks to savings and her settlement was able to make a start.

They live in a humble house. It is for her home that she is seeking a loan: to buy construction materials and build a wall in the back of the home. This will provide more safety and comfort, particularly for the small one who plays in that area of the house.

loans.use: Construction of a wall in the back of her home

loans.name: Aquiles Jose

texts.es: El señor Aquiles Jose M. P., tiene la edad de 54 años vive en el Barrio Laureles Sur, habita acompañado por su pareja de vida, su esposa se dedica a realizar los trabajos del hogar, tienen un hijo de 23 años y el cual se acaba de graduar de Lic. En Administración de Empresas, el labora como Guarda de Seguridad, desde hace mas de 9 años, antes laboro como conductor, de camiones, y fue ahí donde le permitieron dedicarse como guarda de seguridad, ellos habitan en una humilde morada y a la cual desean realizar unos cambios al nivel del techo es para esto que solicitan un préstamo para la compra de materiales de construcción que favorezcan a las comodidades y seguridad sobre todo por las fuertes lluvias que han azotado al país estos últimos meses.
texts.en:
Mr. Aquiles Jose M. P. is 54 years old and resides in the South Laureles neighborhood, where he lives with his life partner. His wife devotes herself to housekeeping. They have a 23-year-old son who just graduated as Bachelor in Business Administration.

For the past nine years he has been working as a security guard. Prior to that he worked as a truck driver and that is where they gave him the opportunity to work as a security guard. They live in a humble dwelling where they want to undertake some remodeling at roof level.

That is why they are requesting a loan: to buy construction materials that will contribute to their comfort and safety, above all for protection against the heavy rains that have plagued the country in recent months.

loans.use: Change the roof level of his home

loans.name: Reyna Maria

texts.es: La señora Reyna Maria O. A., tiene la edad de 42 años es casada vive en el Barrio San Ignacio, sus hijos son mayores de edad y están casados, y sobreviven bajo su propio esfuerzo, ella es agricultora desde hace mas de 21 años y tras este largo periodo se han enfrentado a diferentes problemas de plagas que disminuyen la producción, es para contrarrestar este problema que desea invertir en materiales agrícolas para llevar a cabo un mantenimiento fitosanitario. Con el crédito podrá mejorar a corto plazo el volumen de sus ventas y tener una calidad de vida más favorable para hacer frente a futuros proyectos familiares y económicos.
texts.en: Reyna María O. A. is 42 years old,  married, and lives in the San Ignacio neighbourhood. Her grown-up sons are married and financially independent. She has been a farmer for over 21 years and over this period has encountered different pest problems which reduce production. To combat this problem, she would like to invest in agricultural materials to maintain the health of her crops. The loan will enable her to improve the short-term volume of sales and have a better quality of life, so as to plan better for the future of her family and business.

loans.use: Crop maintenance

loans.name: Concepción

texts.es: La señora Concepción G. L., tiene la edad de 54 años vive en el barrio San Caralampio, es madre soltera  de 5 hijos mayores de edad que sobreviven de manera independientemente  y apoyan a su madre a los gastos que esta incurre, ella es agricultora desde hace mas de 38 años, a problemas de plagas se ha enfrentado a lo largo de su larga experiencia y fue gracias al apoyo de la Reforma Agraria de los 80s que logro iniciar su negocio, a futuro espera diversificar sus cultivos, pero para poder realizar esta inversión primero solicita un préstamo para la ejecución de un mantenimiento fitosanitario, con el crédito comprara fertilizantes, fungicidas, e insumos vegetativos, que le permitan a futuro un mejor capital de trabajo que favorezca a su economía.
texts.en: Concepción G. L. is 54 years old and lives in the San Caralampio neighbourhood. She is a single mother with 5 grown-up children. They live independently and help their mother with her living costs. She has been a farmer for more than 38 years and has faced pest problems throughout her long years in the industry. The support of the Agrarian Reform in the 1980s enabled her to start her business, and in the future she hopes to diversify her crops. However, in order to make this investment she is first requesting a loan to help her maintain the health of her plants. With the loan she will buy fertilisers, fungicides, and raw plant materials. These will allow her to improve her working capital in the future, which will help her financial situation.

loans.use: Crop maintenance

loans.name: René Antonio

texts.es: El señor René Antonio M. L. , tiene la edad de 33 años habita en el barrio Manuel Landes,  es casado y su esposa se dedica al comercio generando ingresos que contribuyen a la economía del hogar, el señor René labora como Mecánico Industrial, tiene 2 años de estar laborando en esto, su casa de habitación es muy humilde pero necesita un préstamo para terminar de construir un muro en las afueras de su hogar, esta inversión le brindara una fachada más presentable, una mayor seguridad, por los fuertes vientos y tormentas que han deteriorado su vivienda, y afectan hasta su vida cotidiana por no ayudar a su familia a favorecer sus condiciones de habitad.
texts.en: Señor René Antonio M. L., age 33, lives in the Manuel Landes neighbourhood. He is married and his wife works to bring in income that contributes to the running of the household. Señor René works as an industrial mechanic - a job he has had for 2 years. His house is a very humble one, but he needs a loan to finish building an external wall. This investment will make the exterior of his house more presentable and more secure, because the fierce winds and tropical storms have taken their toll on the house and really affected the family's everyday life and living conditions.

loans.use: Construction of a wall

loans.name: Rosa Silvia

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 35 años de edad, es soltera y tiene a cargo un hijo. Reside en una zona urbano – marginal de la ciudad de Chiclayo. La ciudad es bastante conocida por su movimiento comercial y de transporte. Es la capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica desde hace mas de diez años a la venta de pescado fresco en las inmediaciones del Mercado Modelo de la ciudad de Chiclayo (el mercado de abastos mas grande de la ciudad) ella adquiere su mercadería muy temprano por la mañana en el terminal pesquero de la región. Rosa se vale de este negocio para sacar adelante a su menor hija y aportar con los gastos de su familia.

Rosa desea adquirir más pescado para poder ampliar su negocio y aumentar su nivel de ventas. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa lograr su objetivo.

Rosa es una persona tranquila y bastante luchadora. En el sector donde se ubica su puesto, todos la conocen por su amabilidad y buen carácter.
texts.en:
Rosa is 35 years old, she is single and she has a child who is in her care. She lives in an urban region, marginal to the city of Chiclayo. The city is very well known for its merchants and its transportation. The city is the capital city of Lambayeque. 

For more than 10 years she has been selling fresh fish in the surroundings of the Modelo market in the city of Chiclayo (the largest market in the city). She acquires her products very early in the morning in the fishing district of the region. Rosa values her business as it is her way to support her daughter and be able to cover the family's expenses.

Rosa wishes to purchase more fish in order to expand her business and see an improvement in her sales. To this end she has requested a first time loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1000 nuevos soles. 

Rosa is a very calm and enterprising person. In the district where she has her stand everyone knows her for her kindness and pleasant character.

loans.use: To purchase fresh fish.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana tiene 47 años de edad, es viuda y reside junto a una de sus hijas en el distrito pesquero de San José, una zona que pertenece a la provincia de Lambayeque y que se encuentra ubicada a más de veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace cinco años a la comercialización de productos de primera necesidad, prendas de vestir y abarrotes en una bodega instalada en su domicilio. Ella se vale de este negocio para solventar sus gastos y sacar adelante a su familia. Juana es una mujer que se ha mostrado optimista ante la adversidad y ha decidido dar todo su esfuerzo para salir adelante. Su esposo era pescador y falleció junto a otros pescadores en un accidente en altamar.

Actualmente el negocio cuenta con una clientela estable que siempre prefiere comprar los productos en su establecimiento debido al buen trato que suele brindar a sus clientes. Ella desea seguir creciendo como empresaria. Por ello ha decidido ampliar su bodega para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes. Siguiendo su objetivo ha ceído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

Las personas que la conocen le tienen mucha estima y respeto. Juana es una mujer tranquila y bastante honrada.
texts.en:
Juana is 47 years old, she is a widow and she lives together with one of her daughter in the fishing district of San Jose. It is a region within the province of Lambayeque, more than twenty minutes from the city of Chiclayo. 

For the past 5 years she has been selling general store products, clothing items, and grocery store items from a store located in a section of her home. She values her business very much because she is able to cover her expenses and she is able to provide for her family. Juana is a woman that has demonstrated to be an optimist in the face of adversity, always willing to do all she can to make it through. Her husband was a fisherman but he passed away along with other fishermen in an accident in the high seas. 

She has earned on a stable client base who always patronize her to purchase the products in her store, especially for the excellent customer service. She wishes to keep growing as a small business owner. To reach her goal she wants to expand her general store and meet the client demand. She has requested a first time loan of Edpyme Alternativa for a loan in the amount of 1000 nuevos soles. 

Those who know her respect her and care of her very much. Juana is a very calm and honest person.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for resale.

loans.name: Manuel Jesus

texts.es:
Manuel es un padre de familia de 51 años de edad que reside en el sector Chosica del Norte, una zona  urbano - marginal del distrito de La Victoria, se encuentra situada a quince minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace cinco años a la comercialización de productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes en una pequeña bodega instalada en su domicilio. Allí el pone al alcance de la mano de sus clientes diversos productos de consumo diario brindando un buen trato, por ello su negocio siempre cuenta con un grupo de cloientes fieles. Adicionalmente cuenta con un pequeño equipo de sonido el cual alquila para amenizar fiestas sociales de la zona en donde vive. Con los ingresos que obtiene de estas actividades el se encarga de sostener la economía de su familia.

Manuel desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más productos de modo que pueda surtir su negocio y pueda satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes. Por ello ha decidido solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 800 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Manuel es una persona tranquila y bastante responsable. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresario para sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Manuel is a family man. He is 51 years old and he lives in the community of Chosica des Norte, a suburban region in the district of La Victoria. It is located fifteen minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

For the past five years he has sold general store products from a store located in a section of his home.  He makes daily use products available to his customers, always making sure to provide them with good customer service. His business has earned a steady client base. He also has a small sound system that he rents out for various special occasions in the region where he lives.  With the income he earns from these businesses he is able to support his family. 

Manuel wishes to expand his business with the purchase of more products, to add variety to his store and satisfy client demand. He has requested a first time loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 800 nuevos soles in order to meet his objectives. 

Manuel is a calm and very responsible person. His goal is to keep growing as a small business owner and to provide for his family.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for resale.

location.town: Chosica del Norte - La Victoria - Chiclayo

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es:
Bertha es una madre de familia de 57 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo en el sector La Pradera del distrito de Pimentel, una zona urbano – marginal que se encuentra situada a diez minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la crianza y venta de cuyes. Ella cría a estos animales en un ambiente de su vivienda alimentándolos de granos y pastos naturales. Los vende al publico en general y a los criadores particulares. Estos animales tienen bastante acogida en el mercado debido a que su carne es muy estimada y consumida en los hogares de todo el país. Con esta actividad ella ayuda a su esposo, que es agricultor, con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia.

Bertha desea mejorar los corrales que posee con la compra de javas y mallas. Asimismo desea adquirir alimento balanceado, todo esto con la finalidad de mejorar la crianza de sus animales y percibir mayores ingresos por sus ventas. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa lograr su objetivo.

Bertha es una mujer responsable y que gusta mucho de la labor que realiza. Su anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresaria y de ese modo mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Bertha is the mother of a family, she is 57 years old and she lives together with her husband in the community of La Pradera of the Pimentel district. It is a suburban region located about 10 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

She raises and sells guinea pigs. She raises them from a customized cage in her home feeding them grains and natural grasses. She sells them to the general public and to private owners.  These animals are in great demand in the market because their meat is well liked and consumed in home in the entire country. With this business she is able to contribute with her husband, an agriculturist, toward the family's finances. 

Bertha wishes to improve the cages with the purchase of wire meshes. She also wants to purchase balanced feed in order to ensure the animals are raised in optimal conditions and be able to see an improvement in earnings. She has requested a first time loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 1500 nuevos soles in order to achieve her goal. 

Bertha is a responsible woman who enjoys her work. Her goal is to keep growing as a small business owner and to improve the quality of life for her family.

loans.use: To upgrade cages.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana es una madre D. D. familia D. 40 años D. edad que resiD. junto a su esposo y a sus hijos en el sector San Nicolás, una zona rural del distrito D. Zaña, un distrito conocido a nivel regional por sus costumbres y danzas D. origen afro – peruano, se encuentra ubicado a cuarenta minutos D. la ciudad D.  Chiclayo.

Se dedica desD. hace diez años a la comercialización D. animales menores. Ella adquiere animales a sus vecinos para criarlos y engordarlos. Cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel D. desarrollo los venD. a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona o los comercializa en una feria que toma lugar una vez por semana en el vecino distrito D. Cayaltí. Los ingresos que percibe D. esta actividad los utiliza para ayudar a su esposo con el sostenimiento D. los gastos familiares.

Juana desea ampliar su negocio adquiriendo más animales para aumentar su nivel D. ventas y percibir más ganancias, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Juana es una mujer tranquila y entregada a su trabajo. Las personas que le conocen le consideran una persona honrada y confiable.
texts.en:
Juana is the mother of a family, she is 40 year sold and she lives together with her husband and their children in the community of San Nicolas, a rural region in the district of Zana. The district is regionally known for its customs and their Afro-Peruvian dances. It is located forty minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

For the past ten years she has been raising livestock. She acquires livestock from her neighbors to raise them. When they have reached a certain level in the development she sells them to merchants who visit the region or she sells them in country fairs once per week in the neighboring city of Cayatli. The profits she earns will be used to cover the family's expenses.

Juana wishes to expand her business with the purchase of more livestock, wishing to see an improvement in the sales and in her earnings. She has requests a first time loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 1000 nuevos soles to meet her objective. 

Juana is a calm person who is very devoted to her work. Those who know her consider her to be an honest and trustworthy person.

loans.use: To purchase livestock.

loans.name: Laureano

texts.es:
Laureano tiene 55 años de edad, es casado y reside junto a su esposa y a sus hijos en el sector Sialupe Baca del distrito de Lambayeque. Una zona situada aproximadamente a media hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales menores. El cría ovejas y aves de corral en diversos ambientes situados cerca a su domicilio, los engorda y cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que siempre visitan la zona en donde vive. Esta actividad es su principal fuente ingreso por lo que trata de mantenerla del mejor modo posible.

Laureano desea adquirir mas animales para ampliar su negocio y aumentar el número de ventas. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1200 nuevos soles.

El es una persona tranquila y bastante emprendedora. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresario para mejorar gradualmente la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Laureano is 55 years old, he is married and he lives together with his wife and their children in the community of Sialupe Baca in the district of Lambayeque. It is a region located about half an hour from the city of Chiclayo.

He raises livestock for a living. He has sheep and poultry in various corrals located near his home.
